room_title: Escape room "The Basement" by Forbidden Escape in Hartford
room_description:
About thirty years ago, there was a string of mysterious disappearances connected to one of the oldest performance theatres in the state, the Mystique. Partial remains of the victims were later found in the basement of the theater, along with many unexplained paranormal instruments.
Stories of strange sightings around the building continue to this day. Locals believe they hunt for new bodies on the hour and take those that are found. The theater remains standing, closed and abandoned to the public.â€‹
While out looking for a friend who called afraid of a parallel fate, you become trapped in the basement of the old theater. You have one hour to find your friend and get out before the shadows return to the Basement.
